Voltage.summary: Gets the DC or instantaneous voltage over the device.

Current.summary: Gets the DC or instantaneous current through the device.

Power.summary: Gets the DC or instantaneous power dissipation by the device.
Power.value: The DC or instantaneous power dissipation.

Voltage.summary: Gets the complex voltage over the device.

Current.summary: Gets the complex current through the device.

Power.summary: Gets the complex power dissipation by the device.
